The Last of Us 2 represents how games sh: One of the best games I played this year. Despite all the controversy\, I think that as a whole the story is beautifully harsh and real. It tells a story of a girl who got her heartbroken and lost herself to anger. And on the flip side\, it’s also a story of redemption. Joel’s actions affected Abby. Abby’s actions affected Ellie. Ellie’s actions affected Abby. It’s a cycle of violence that stopped when they decided not to kill each other. When Ellie made the choice not to kill her.The ending\, however bittersweet\, has a sliver of hope when it comes to Ellie and Dina. Perhaps explored in a DLC? I sure hope so. My only complaint is some parts of the story I felt were dragging. But it seems every time I started thinking ‘man I’ve been exploring without action for a while’\, I would get jumped or something crazy happened.The action was insane\, the gameplay was solid and the world we got to explore was simply breathtakingSpectacular game.… Expand
